data.title: University of Missouri - Kansas City
data.meta_description: Find out who has served as provost for the University of Missouri Kansas City through the years.
data.text:
Past Provosts

The provost is the chief academic officer of the university. Though the name and scope of responsibilities have changed for the provost throughout the years, the position has remained dedicated to aiding the university in its pursuit of academic excellence.

2015-2020 | Barbara Bichelmeyer, Provost/Executive Vice Chancellor

2015 | Cindy Pemberton, Interim Provost

2008-2015 | Gail Hackett, Provost/Executive Vice Chancellor

2007-2008 | Betty M. Drees, Interim Provost/Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

2005-2007 | Bruce S. Bubacz, Provost/Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

2004-2005 | William P. Osborne, Interim Provost/Provost/Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

2001-2004 | Stephen Ballard, Provost/Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

2000-2001 | Bill Eddy, Interim Provost

1999-2000 | Marjorie Smelstor, Interim Provost

1999-2000 | Gordon H. Lamb, Interim Chancellor/Provost

1995-2000 | Marvin R. Querry, Executive Vice Provost/Executive Dean for Academic Affairs

1993-1999 | Eleanor B. Schwartz, Chancellor/Provost

1993-1995 | Marvin R. Querry, Vice Provost/Executive Dean

1991-1993 | Eleanor B. Schwartz, Interim Chancellor

1991-1993 | Marvin R. Querry, Acting Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

1986-1991 | Eleanor B. Schwartz, Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

1980-1986 | Eugene P. Trani, Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

1979-1980 | Wheadon Bloch, Acting Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

1979 | Marvin E. Revzin, Vice Chancellor for Academic Affairs

1973-1979 | Wesley J. Dale, Provost

1972-1973 | Wesley J. Dale, Dean of Faculties/Acting Provost

1970-1972 | Richard R. Armitage, Dean of Faculties/Provost

1965-1969 | John G. L. Dowgray, Dean of Faculties

1961-1965 | Carleton Scofield, Chancellor

1960-1962 | Carleton Scofield, Dean of Faculties/Vice President for Academic Affairs

1959-1960 | Ted R. Brannen, Vice Chancellor for Academic and Business Affairs/Dean of Faculties

1956-1959 | Lorenz Misbach, Vice-Chancellor

1955-1956 | Richard M. Drake, Vice President of the University

1947-1953 | Robert Mortvedt, Vice President of the University
